translation1: "Today, let's take a look at some \"weird searches\" [奇怪的热搜]. What is the normal public opinion? Randomly select three hot searches: February 2nd Dragon Raises Its Head, Hua Li Friend Raises Prices, and the Pinduoduo Incident, public opinion spreads and forms a peak, then [指数下降] (smooth curve) eventually dissipates. If secondary public opinion is generated, there will be a small peak again.They look exactly the same as the network sentiment evolution model displayed on the official website of the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology. What is abnormal sentiment? Randomly select six hot searches from the same event and present them in the form of a peak, a sawtooth, and a cliff.【Isolated Peak】This refers to the situation where individuals act as a catalyst for heating and quickly climb the hot search rankings, attracting the attention of the public.  【Sawtooth Pattern】This refers to the situation where there is periodic heating, ensuring that the topic stays on the hot search rankings.  【Cliff Edge】This refers to the situation where there is a collective withdrawal, and the hot search performs its \"function\" by receiving a new task and moving towards a new battlefield. In Figure 9, the peak of one event's heat wave exactly matches the trough of another event's heat wave, occurring at the same time and with no time difference, indicating that the unified water army has received a new task and launched a new offensive. The professionalism of black public relations can be seen in a few spots: several hot searches at the same time, which ones attract attention, which ones are responsible for popularization, which ones provoke war, which ones shift the focus, which ones influence cognition, which ones lead to misjudgments, which ones arouse emotions, which ones manipulate decisions, and which onesTranslation:  Spreading is a science, discarding subjective factors such as opinions and emotions, and only relying on objective data. Even black public relations will have nowhere to hide. All traces must be left behind when passing through, and these traces, let's dig them out together. Data source: Time Capsule."

translation1: "Is it because the bathtub is leaking electricity? Choosing an appropriate bathtub can have a good therapeutic effect on your feet. Today, the country's small editor will answer this question and hope to be helpful to friends. With the enhancement of people's health awareness, bathtubs are increasingly favored by consumers, and a variety of products with different specifications have emerged on the market, ranging from hundreds of yuan to thousands of yuan, providing consumers with a wide range of choices.On the relevant data, compared to traditional home appliances, healthcare appliances such as foot baths are selling like hotcakes. However, there is no dedicated industry standard for foot baths, which poses a certain safety risk. \"It's too dangerous to soak your feet in electric water, isn't it?\" Mr. Li told the reporter. Recently, he bought a foot bath as a gift for his father's birthday, but when his father soaked his feet, he felt a tingling sensation in his soles.Mr. Li initially thought it was the vibration function of the bathtub that was causing the sensation in his feet, but he didn't realize that he had turned off the vibration function. Even after turning off the vibration function, his father still felt a tingling sensation in his feet. Mr. Li tried writing with a pen, and to his surprise, the pen lit up. Mr. Li discovered that the water in the bathtub was electrified. Later, he contacted the store and the store's attitude was not bad, even though he returned the bathtub, Mr. Li still felt unhappy.Because he discovered that there is no clear and detailed industry regulation on the popular bathtub that has been around for a long time, such as how to set the highest temperature, which group of people it is suitable for, what materials are guaranteed to be safe, etc. However, in general, bathtubs are not prone to have electrical problems, but it is not ruled out that some products may not have been strictly inspected during the manufacturing process. Therefore, it is recommended to choose a disassembled bathtub when purchasing.Water and electricity separation has no safety hazards. At the same time, you can freely take an electric pen test."

translation1: "Educational news: The ratio of special talents in Beijing's middle school entrance examination in 2016 was compressed on the 21st and 22nd of January, and the organization of the middle school entrance examination for special talents in Beijing was unified by the respective education committees of each district. This year, the admission ratio of special talents in Beijing's middle schools has been compressed, and the competition among special talents has become more intense.Using Chongqing City as an example, the proportion of primary school students who are admitted to junior high school with special talents this year is generally less than 5% of the total number of students admitted to the district's enrollment plan, with a planned enrollment of 380 people. The enrollment ratio of the school does not exceed 10% of the planned enrollment of the school. Students with sports, art, and science and technology specialties who have registered online are eligible to participate in the special talent enrollment examination. To facilitate students' nearby participation in the examination, Chongqing City continues the examination arrangement of last year and sets up 1-2 examination sites in each school, with a total of 13 examination sites.The examination points are divided into examination zones according to the examination zone, and the examination time is divided into units of one hour to arrange the examination schedule. On the day of the examination, students will enter the examination points at different examination zones and take the examination according to the examination schedule. On May 23rd, the list of students who passed the examination in the district education admission test center was announced on the official website, and students can query the examination results on the website."

translation1: "The Yangtze River's mainstream has achieved full coverage of water-based green integrated service areas - Xinhua Net, December 11, 2022 (reporter Wang Xian). The Qingbaijiang Water-based Green Integrated Service Area in Chongqing was successfully put into operation on the 10th, becoming the second water-based green integrated service area on the upper reaches of the Yangtze River after the Qingzhou Water-based Green Integrated Service Area in Sichuan was officially put into operation on the 8th. With this, the water-based green integrated service area has covered the entire length of the Yangtze River from upstream to downstream.The Ministry of Transport and the Yangtze River Navigation Administration have established 10 green comprehensive service areas along the middle and lower reaches of the Yangtze River in provinces such as Hubei, Hunan, Jiangxi, Anhui, and Jiangsu, which have been well received by ship crews and played an important role in promoting the high-quality development of Yangtze River shipping. The establishment of the green comprehensive service areas along the Yangtze River is another milestone event in the construction of green Yangtze River shipping, and it has significantly improved the reception of Yangtze River ship pollutants and the service capabilities of shipping. According to the introduction, the green comprehensive service areas provide comprehensive production and living services for all types of ships and ship crews, and are an important facility for helping ship crews solve the \"urgent, difficult, and worrisome\" problems.This is the translation from Chinese to English:  The two water-based green comprehensive service areas built and put into operation on the upper reaches of the Yangtze River this time, integrate life services, production services, and public services into one body, with green environmental protection as the main theme, and ship maintenance and emergency rescue services as their special features. They aim to provide \"one-stop docking and multiple services\" for ships in the port, making the work of sailors who regularly sail on the Yangtze River more efficient and their lives more convenient."

translation1: "What is the drinking method for red label whisky? Everyone has different hobbies, some people like to collect, some people like to eat, of course, there are also people who like to drink whisky. Red label whisky is one of the best-selling Scottish whiskies in all countries, and it has also won a gold medal at the International Wine and Spirit Competition. Each bottle of red label whisky has its own unique flavor, but if you don't know how to taste it, wouldn't it be a waste of its rich aroma?So, how do you drink the red label whiskey? The editor will introduce it to everyone in a simple way. The drinking method of red label whiskey is as follows:Tongni gets a red label whisky made from about 35 types of Scottish whisky, with a rich and fragrant aroma and the characteristics of traditional Scottish whisky. The fragrance is sweet and smoky, with a hint of vanilla. The taste is fresh and clean at the beginning, with a slight aroma of grass and a strong taste of smoked barley. This whisky can be drunk directly with ice or mixed with your favorite drink.Red Label whiskey has entered the domestic market, in order to adapt to the taste of the Chinese people, Red Label whiskey + Coca-Cola, Sprite, or New Coke, etc. carbonated beverages have become a fashionable drink that lasts forever. These sweet drinks not only have the effect of neutralizing acidity, but also visually bring happiness to people, and when added to the drink, they have the effect of changing the taste of the mouth. Red Label whiskey + lemon slice + sugar (sand sugar can also be used), is the most authentic and traditional way of drinking.The traditional red label whiskey has a slightly sour taste, which can be neutralized by adding sugar. Lemon can also bring a refreshing aroma to the wine, of course, the sweet-sour taste can be adjusted according to personal taste preferences. The above three are the best way to drink red labeled whiskey, and everyone can try them as a reference. I hope my introduction can help everyone."

translation1: "The curator of the first contemporary art biennial in Saudi Arabia collaborated with the UCCA Center for Contemporary Art in Beijing to organize the exhibition, which was officially opened to the public on December 11 in the Diriyah JAX Arts Center located in the northwest of the Saudi capital Riyadh. A total of 64 artists from Saudi Arabia, China, and other regions participated in the exhibition. The first contemporary art biennial in Saudi Arabia, the Diriyah Biennial, was jointly planned by the Diriyah Biennial Foundation and the UCCA Center for Contemporary Art in Beijing. The director of the UCCA Center for Contemporary Art in Beijing, Tian Yi, served as the art director of the exhibition.According to the introduction by the curatorial team, the theme of this year's exhibition is \"Touching the Stones to Cross the River,\" which represents the reform strategies taken during the period of social and economic transformation in Saudi Arabia, and also reflects the current situation of cultural development in Saudi society. The exhibition covers an area of nearly 12,000 square meters and is housed in six interconnected buildings, with six units presented: \"Touching the Stones to Cross the River,\" \"Tradition as Experiment,\" \"Edge Thinking,\" \"Going Public,\" \"Beautiful New World,\" and \"On the Spirit of Art.\" Among the 27 Saudi Arabian artists' works, more than 50% of the total number of exhibits are included, covering painting, installation art, and performance art in various forms; 12 Chinese artists' works are also well-received, some of whom use recycled materials in innovative ways, such as Xu Bing's \"The Story Behind the Mountains Never Ends\" series (2014), which reconstructs a classic landscape painting using discarded objects.The director of the Diriyah Biennale Foundation, Bakkali, expressed the hope that this year's biennale would establish an international dialogue, allowing audiences around the world to understand the cultural and creative industries of Saudi Arabia and its vibrant creative community, and strengthen interaction and exchange. Tianwei Yu said: \"The goal of the biennale is double, allowing Saudi Arabia's contemporary art to participate in the global conversation and also allowing Saudi audiences to immerse themselves in the world of contemporary art.\" According to reports, a series of lectures will also be held during the opening period of the biennale, with artists, curators, and leaders of the creative industry discussing topics such as cross-cultural exchange and contemporary art development."

translation1: "In September 2020, Mr. Li learned about a factory building located in Shaoxing, Yongjia, Zhejiang from his house. After visiting the site multiple times, Mr. Li decided to buy the factory building. In December of the same year, after negotiating with the owner's family member Ms. Lin regarding the details of the purchase, Mr. Li paid a deposit of 200,000 yuan by transferring money through a bank. Ms. Lin signed the \"Factory Building Sale and Purchase Agreement\" as the payee, and it was stipulated in the agreement that if the buyer did not want to buy the factory building, the deposit would belong to the seller, and if the seller did not want to sell the factory building, the deposit would be returned to the buyer doubled. Both parties agreed to sign the factory building sale and purchase agreement within a week.However, after both parties failed to reach a consensus on key contract terms such as factory building sales range and payment methods, the house purchase and sale contract was delayed again and again. Considering that the two parties could not reach a consensus on the contract content, a few days later, Mr. Lin refunded the 200,000 yuan deposit to Mr. Liu. After a long search, Mr. Liu finally found a suitable house, paid the deposit, and was ready to sign the contract. However, the seller did not sell the house, which made Mr. Liu feel helpless and angry.For this reason, Mr. Lin sued Mr. Wang to the Yuyang City People's Court. The court, after hearing, considered that the two parties were unable to sign a formal contract and could not solely blame the defendant. Therefore, it was reasonable to infer that the negotiation failed, and thus this case should not apply the penalty of double return of deposit. The defendant did not need to bear the breach of contract liability for returning the deposit twice. After the first-instance judgment, the plaintiff filed an appeal.Recently, the second instance court upheld the original verdict. [Legal advisor] In the course of trade, it is necessary to fulfill the duty of prudence and caution. As a buyer, it is necessary to fulfill the duty of prudence and caution when signing a contract, such as verifying the ownership information of the property, whether the property is occupied by someone, and other relevant information. It is also necessary to clearly specify the specific time and place of delivery in the contract to avoid disputes between the parties when fulfilling the contract."

To ensure the quality and effectiveness of the training, Jiangxi plans to train one person in music, art, and sports in each of the 100 counties (cities, districts) in the province, a total of 300 trainees, and comprehensively improve their teaching demonstration leading ability, teaching research activity design ability, teaching ability, and network training workshop construction ability, playing the role of teaching, demonstrating, guiding, and supervising."

translation1: "The National Defense and Epidemic Prevention Mechanism of the State Council recently issued a notice on strengthening the prevention and control of the COVID-19 epidemic in border cities. It requires that people who need to leave the land border cities (excluding those with Hong Kong and Macao) within 48 hours must have a 48-hour nucleic acid test negative certificate, and after arriving in the land border city, they must undergo at least one nucleic acid test. According to the notice, the time range for the above requirements is from the date of confirmation of the border city by each province, region, and city and the announcement of the border city range to March 15, 2022.In addition, the notice also proposes that under certain conditions, cities along the border can study the establishment of epidemic prevention buffer zones within their jurisdiction. The National Health and Health Commission's Disease Prevention and Control Office responsible person introduced that for some border cities, cross-border trade is the main economic pillar for the local area, and people from both sides travel back and forth frequently. Implementing differentiated management policies, which was originally a single line of defense, can become two lines of defense, with the hope of achieving pre-emptive control and compressing the risk of epidemic spread, thus achieving the maximum epidemic prevention effect with the minimum social impact and the lowest social cost.Recently, there have been many local outbreaks of the epidemic in China, all of which are imported from abroad through border cities. The above notice points out that this exposes some problems in the monitoring and early warning of local epidemics, the implementation of closed-loop management for high-risk positions, the formality of regular nucleic acid testing, the inadequate disinfection of cold chain logistics, the irregular management of centralized isolation sites, and the insufficient scientific and accurate handling of the epidemic. The notice requires efforts to be made from nine aspects, including completing the mechanisms for border city epidemic prevention and control, improving the epidemic monitoring and early warning system, implementing border control measures, and strengthening the management of centralized isolation sites. We must not relax our guard, do scientific and precise work in epidemic prevention and control, and tighten the defenses at the border to prevent the import of epidemics.The notice emphasizes that cities along the coast should synchronize the prevention and control of the epidemic with the guarantee of basic living needs, and publish and widely disseminate the hotline for basic living needs guarantee. It should regularly inspect the supply and price of basic living necessities, and promptly solve and proactively respond to prominent issues reflected by the public. According to the notice, the cities along the coast include the counties (cities, districts, banners), cities (autonomous regions, municipalities), and directly-administered cities located at the land, water, and air ports. The specific scope shall be determined by each province (autonomous region, municipality) based on the epidemic prevention and control needs and announced in a timely manner."

translation1: "A group of Asian-American organizations filed a complaint with the U.S. Department of Education and the Justice Department on May 23, protesting against three Ivy League schools - Harvard University, Brown University, and Dartmouth College - for discriminating against Asian-American applicants in the admissions process. The Asian American Education Foundation, which led the complaint, held a press conference in Washington D.C. on the same day.The chairman of this group, Zhao Yuchun, said at the press conference that in the past 10 years, the number of Asian applicants who meet the admission criteria of American top universities has doubled, but in these three top American universities, the proportion of Asians remains basically the same. Many studies have shown that these universities discriminate against Asian applicants in the \"holistic consideration\" admission process. Zhao Yuchun introduced that a study by Sanders and others in 2014 showed that in these three universities, the admission rate for Asians was the lowest among all ethnic groups relative to the number of applicants.The data from the US Department of Education also shows that among all Ivy League schools, Brown University and Dartmouth College have the lowest admission rates for Asian students. Yale University and Brown University have implemented de facto racial quotas for Asian applicants for over 20 years. Zhao Yushuo told a reporter from Xinhua that they hope to submit a complaint to the US Department of Education and the Justice Department to investigate and take action after the fact to prevent these universities from continuing to discriminate against Asians in their admissions. They also hope that the universities that have been complained about will proactively address this issue and change their admission policies towards Asians.Currently, the three schools that have been complained about have not made any responses. The Asian American Education Alliance was established in 2015, when it filed a complaint against Harvard University's discriminatory admissions practices. However, the US Department of Education did not accept the complaint due to procedural reasons. This time, in addition to the Chinese-American organizations that participated in the complaint, there were also Indian-American, Korean-American, Japanese-American, and Pakistani-American education organizations that participated in the complaint."

translation1: "The joint drill \"Peaceful Relief-2021\" between the Chinese and Vietnamese militaries has successfully concluded. All participating Chinese troops have safely returned to China's Guangxi border region, marking the successful completion of the 7-day training mission. During this exercise, the two militaries focused on the topic of humanitarian medical relief and tightly adhered to the mission of guarding and rescuing the wounded. They completed the joint command, field rescue, and mass treatment of casualties according to realistic standards, effectively enhancing their capabilities in providing security guarantees.The results of the exercise were recognized by both the Chinese and Vietnamese militaries. During the closing ceremony, Nguyen Huong Son, the chairman of the Vietnamese exercise guidance committee and the deputy chief of staff of the Vietnamese People's Army Medical Department, said that through this exercise, Vietnamese medical personnel had learned about the organization and professional activities from Chinese medical personnel, as well as the medical and protective equipment of the Chinese side. The achievements of the exercise demonstrated the professional capabilities of the medical forces of both countries in medical assistance and epidemic prevention and control.The Chinese guidance and coordination team leader and the deputy director of the Logistics Support Department of the Central Military Commission, Chen Chunming, said that this exercise was another innovative practice based on the successful joint search and rescue activity held in 2018, with significant milestone significance. During the exercise, the Chinese People's Liberation Army donated medical protective masks, medical protective clothing, and rapid nucleic acid testing equipment to the Vietnamese People's Army for health and epidemic prevention purposes."
